data.text: Winjuru wachni, un ji duto:
un joma odhier kod joma idew,
Dhoga biro wacho weche mag rieko,
Abiro chiko ita ne ngero moro;
En ngʼa monego aluor ka ndalo mag richo obiro,
Joma oketo genogi kuom mwandu
Onge ngʼama nyalo waro ngima nyawadgi
Nikech yor waro dhano tek ahinya,
ma dimi odag nyaka chiengʼ
Nikech ongʼere ne ji duto ni joma riek tho,
Lietegi ema biro siko kaka utegi nyaka chiengʼ
To ongʼere ni dhano ok siki e piny,
Mano e gima biro timore ne joma ogenore kendgi giwegi,
Gichomo liete mokuny nigi mana kaka rombe
Anto Nyasaye biro reso chunya mi ogola e liel adier,
Kik chunyi thagre ka ngʼato mwandune medore,
nikech onge gima obiro kawo odhigo ka otho,
kata obedo ni ne okawore kaka ngʼama ogwedhi kane pod ongima
to obiro dhi mi oriwre gi tiengʼ machon mar kwerene,
Ngʼat man-gi mwandu mathoth to onge winjo,
